name: Ahana  Bhasin
text: I loved every second of it. The movie was a revelation.

name: Dummy
text: I felt like I was right there with the characters. The movie was a true cinematic experience. I was left in awe of the sheer brilliance of it all.

name: Kaira Baral
text: The movie was a true work of art. The movie was a true masterpiece of cinema.
